example1.title: Real photo
example1.desc: Photo taken with a smartphone, no AI generation signs detected.

example2.title: AI Portrait
example2.desc: Portrait created with Midjourney. AI artifacts detected in eyes and hair.

example3.title: Authentic video
example3.desc: Video captured with a camera. Natural movement and temporal coherence.

example4.title: Deepfake
example4.desc: AI-generated video. Inconsistencies in facial expressions detected.

example5.title: Mixed content
example5.desc: AI-retouched photo. Mix of real and generated content.

example6.title: AI Landscape
example6.desc: Landscape created with DALL-E. Impossible structures and artificial textures.

welcome.title: Welcome to FakeTect!
welcome.desc: Detect in seconds whether an image or video was AI-generated. Here's how it works.

upload.title: Step 1: Upload
upload.desc: Drag and drop or click to upload your file. Images (JPG, PNG, WEBP) or videos (MP4, MOV) up to 100 MB.
upload.tip: Tip: Long videos are analyzed on the first 60 seconds to optimize costs.

analyze.title: Step 2: Analysis
analyze.desc: Our AI analyzes your file in seconds. We use multiple models for maximum accuracy.
analyze.tip: Multiple sources: Sightengine, Illuminarty, and OpenAI for reliable results.

result.title: Step 3: Result
result.desc: Get a confidence score and a clear verdict: REAL, AI, or UNCERTAIN. Download a PDF certificate to prove authenticity.
result.tip: The PDF certificate includes a QR code and is ideal for official documents.

ready.title: You're ready!
ready.desc: FREE plan: 10 analyses in 30 days. Upgrade to a paid plan for more analyses and advanced features.

banner.title: Cookie Management
banner.description: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze traffic and personalize content. Strictly necessary cookies are always enabled. You can manage your preferences below.
